message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $120 to you and we're confident it will meet all your needs. Let's make this valuable item yours for $110 today!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in your product, but $110 is still a bit outside my budget. I'm willing to pay $100 for it. What do you think?
Thank you for your response, Bob. Considering your interest in the product, I'm willing to negotiate further. How about we aim for a price of $105?
